title: Peer-Led Discussion Circle Design Based on Mathematical Texts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and text analysis skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning analyzing mathematical thematic texts in digital collaborative environments

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three interpretive perspectives by analyzing math-related texts.
Learners can revise and supplement their arguments at least twice based on peer feedback.
Learners can identify and refute logical fallacies with 80% accuracy during discussions.

resources: Set of Texts Explaining Mathematical Concepts

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
